revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:

|brand = StarFive |model = VisionFive |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 4 October 2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/StarFive_VisionFive |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = StarFive;JH7100;JH7100-U74x2; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25LQ128EWIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNNCPUML-XRNEE; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Motorcomm;YT8521SH; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 6C:CF:39 |oui = 70:4A:0E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB Female (Type-C) |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = no
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 1.4, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, Audio out (3.5mm), Bluetooth 4.2 (BLE), I2C, I2S, SPI, UART |addchip = 4K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24FC04;;1;,,, 1Mbit NOR Flash;GigaDevice;GD25D10CEIGR;;1;,,, USB PD Power Receiving Protocol Chip;WCH;CH224;;1;,,, USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1;,,, 4-bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;Union Semi;UM3204;;2;,,, 4-pin Voltage Monitors w/ Manual Reset;Union Semiconductor;UM805;;1;,,, Programmable Multirail PMU for Multicore Processors;TI;TPS65086100;;1;,,, Fixed 5V 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ 100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, Dual Channel EMI Filter w/ int. ESD Protection;Nexperia;PCMF2USB;;6;,,, Synchronous Buck NexFET Power Block;TI;CSD87381P;;2;,,, 20V 1.4A Step-Up Voltage Regulator;TI;LMR62014;;1;,,, Precision Load Switch with Adjustable Current;ETA Solutions;ETA6020D2G-T/U;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;2; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2021 |estprice = 175 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B09NKVR2QG |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6236 |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43436; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "VisionFive v1" is silkscreened on board top.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[StarFive]]'' JH7100-U74x2 @1.0GHz Dual-Core :SoC: RISC-V; NPU: NVDLA Engine 1 core 3.5 TOPS :VPU: H.264/H.265 decoder up to 4Kp60, :dual-stream decoding up to 4Kp30 *Storage: 16MB (SPI) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Memory: 8GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM (''SK hynix'') *WiFi: [[AMPAK]] AP6236 ([[Broadcom]] BCM43436) :802.11bgn (1T1R), BT 4.2 BLE *Network: 1x GbE port (w/ PoE support) *USB: 4x USB 3.1 ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB Type-C supporting USB :PD 2.0 and Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0
==Links of Interest== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/beaglev-risc-v-sbc-reborn-as-visionfive-v1/ ''BeagleV RISC-V SBC reborn as VisionFive V1'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/11/27/visionfive-v1-risc-v-linux-sbc-resurrects-beaglev-single-board-computer/ ''VisionFive V1 RISC-V Linux SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''']
